content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unreal Engine is a game engine. Written in C++, the Unrel Engine features a high degree of portability, supporting a wide range of platforms. EPAM team is taking part in testing Unreal Engine version 4 and 5. We are providing manual testing and test case execution. This test case execution consists of the execution and testing across different areas in Unreal Engine.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have now more than 30 testers in our team always ready to help each other and continue to grow! The most experienced guys and girls on our project become analysts and help Epic Games to analyze and create the environment for testing and test cases.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our testers provide testing on a huge number of devices: desktop devices with high performance, mobile devices, consoles and even on AR and VR devices (like Hololens, Magic Lip, HTC Vive or Valve Index).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"But we also often face challenges, as we have to deal with unfamiliar things. However, this only increases our expertise in work with Unreal Engine.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":105520,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3717ef1b-8f02-4174-a088-e349bf1ed9b9/19.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3717ef1b-8f02-4174-a088-e349bf1ed9b9/19.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"19.JPG\",\"name\":\"19.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3717ef1b-8f02-4174-a088-e349bf1ed9b9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":431},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
